Bloonarius.desc: No fancy gimmicks, just spawns a bunch of Bloons and has a bunch of health.

for every 1% of HP lost spawns **8 greens**
for every 25% of HP lost spawns **30 greens and 30 ceramics**

for every 1% of HP lost spawns **15 yellows**
for every 25% of HP lost spawns **60 yellows and 60 ceramics**

for every 1% of HP lost spawns **25 pinks**
for every 25% of HP lost spawns **100 pinks and 6 MOABs**

for every 1% of HP lost spawns **15 zebras**
for every 25% of HP lost spawns **60 zebras and 10 ZOMGs**

for every 1% of HP lost spawns **25 rainbows**
for every 25% of HP lost spawns **100 rainbows and 1 BAD**

Lych.desc: The Lych is complicated; it can gain health from towers sold while it's on screen and also heals from buffs along with removing them and stunning affected towers. Lych cannot heal above its starting health.
normalDesc: ### Sell Life Steal
Heals **1%** HP per highest tier of the tower sacrificed (example: a tier 5 tower would heal 5% of lych's max HP, crosspathing doesn't matter).
### Buff Life Steal

Heals **2%** HP for each buff stolen and stuns affected towers for **5 seconds**. The buff steal has **100 range** at tiers 1-4 and **infinite range** at tier 5. Can only steal buffs once per 12 seconds.
### Reanimated Blimps

Reanimated blimps at each skull phase spawn based off of popped blimps from the **past 20 seconds** at all tiers. Reanimated blimps have the same properties as their normal counterparts (i.e. can be stunned, insta-killed, etc)
### Lych-Soul
The Lych-Soul's speed is always **100%** of a Red Bloon. The Lych-Soul has the same properties as the main boss.
eliteDesc: ### Sell Life Steal
Heals **1%** HP per highest tier of the tower sacrificed (example: a tier 5 tower would heal 5% of lych's max HP, crosspathing doesn't matter).
### Buff Life Steal

Heals **4%** HP for each buff stolen and stuns affected towers for **5 seconds**. The buff steal has **100 range** at tiers 1-4 and **infinite range** at tier 5. Can only steal buffs once per 12 seconds.
### Reanimated Blimps

Reanimated blimps at each skull phase spawn based off of popped blimps from the **past 20 seconds** at all tiers. Reanimated blimps have the same properties as their normal counterparts (i.e. can be stunned, insta-killed, etc)
### Lych-Soul
The Lych-Soul's speed is always **100%** of a Red Bloon. The Lych-Soul has the same properties as the main boss.

Vortex.desc: Vortex is the fastest Boss in the game so far, but that's not all it has up its sleeve. It has lots of abilities on its damage phases, detailed below.
normalDesc: ### Storm Pulse
Destroys all nearby projectiles in a 80 unit radius. (This includes spike factories, bloon trap and bananas, but does not include powers like Camo Trap).
Happens every **5 seconds** and immediately once Vortex reaches a skull
### Slipstream
Affects all Bloons behind Vortex, causing them to move at **2.5x** speed at all tiers.
## On Skull
Upon reaching a skull:
### Projectile Reflection

The reflection occurs within **80r** and lasts for **6 seconds** after each skull and on spawn. This reflects **every** projectile except for instant-hitters (i.e. Sniper, First Strike ability, etc)...
### Tower Stun
Affects towers within **60r**. During the stun, all towers affected cannot be sold.
### Knockback
Vortex is knocked back by **100 units** for all tiers.
eliteDesc: ### Storm Pulse
Destroys all nearby projectiles in a 80 unit radius. (This includes spike factories, bloon trap and bananas, but does not include powers like Camo Trap).
Happens every **5 seconds** and immediately once Vortex reaches a skull
### Slipstream
Affects all Bloons behind Vortex, causing them to move at **2.5x** speed at all tiers.
## On Skull
Upon reaching a skull:
### Projectile Reflection

The reflection occurs within **80r** and lasts for **6 seconds** after each skull and on spawn. This reflects **every** projectile except for instant-hitters (i.e. Sniper, First Strike ability, etc)...
### Tower Stun
Affects towers within **60r**. During the stun, all towers affected cannot be sold.
### Knockback
Vortex is knocked back by **100 units** for all tiers.

Dreadbloon.desc: Dreadbloon has several special immunities to entire tower categories that cycle at each damage phase, while also passively spawning beefy Dreadrock Bloons, detailed below.
normalDesc: ### Immunities

Begins with an immunity to Primary, then changes to Military -> Magic -> Support after each phase. **This also affects Paragons** of those tower categories. Immunities apply to newly spawned Dreadrock Bloons and its Ceramic Armor Shell. Dreadbloon also has **lead properties**, but this does not affect its Shell or Dreadrock Bloons.
### Ceramic Armor Shell

Created when the boss spawns and at every damage phase. Has the HP of **half that of the entire Tier** (ex - every T1 shell has 3,750 HP). Dreadbloon moves at **0.3x speed** while its Shell is active.
### Dreadrock Bloons

**Spawned passively** as Dreadbloon's Shell is still active. A group of Dreadrock Bloons are also spawned at each skull. Each Dreadrock Bloon has **both MOAB and BOSS properties**, and **cannot be stalled or instakilled**. Towers set to 'strong' will always target Dreadrock Bloons over everything else. The Rock's speed is always 88% of a Red Bloon.
eliteDesc: ### Immunities

Begins with an immunity to Primary, then changes to Military -> Magic -> Support after each phase. **This also affects Paragons** of those tower categories. Immunities apply to newly spawned Dreadrock Bloons and its Ceramic Armor Shell. Dreadbloon also has **lead properties**, but this does not affect its Shell or Dreadrock Bloons.
### Ceramic Armor Shell

Created when the boss spawns and at every damage phase. Has the HP of **half that of the entire Tier** (ex - every T1 shell has 7,500 HP). Dreadbloon moves at **0.35x speed** while its Shell is active.
### Dreadrock Bloons

**Spawned passively** as Dreadbloon's Shell is still active. A group of Dreadrock Bloons are also spawned at each skull. Each Dreadrock Bloon has **both MOAB and BOSS properties**, and **cannot be stalled or instakilled**. Towers set to 'strong' will always target Dreadrock Bloons over everything else. The Rock's speed is always 88% of a Red Bloon.

Dreadbloon.customRounds:
Leads & Ceramics become Fortified
Zebras -> Leads
Rainbows -> Ceramics
For rounds 40-69, every other regular MOAB is fortified (BFBs+ unaffected)
For rounds 70+, every MOAB is fortified (BFBs+ unaffected)
There are some exceptions:
R 39|18 Rainbows -> 12 fLeads, 6 Ceramics
R 40|MOAB -> 10 fLeads, 8 fCeramics
R 43|10 Rainbows -> 10 fLeads
R 46|replaced by 1 fMOAB
R 60|replaced by 3 fMOABs, 40 fLeads
R 80|replaced by a copy of R75

Phayze.desc: Phayze is a camo boss bloon that has a variety of "reality-warping" gimmicks, and resistance to camo removal.
normalDesc: Spawns with **Camo**, and has 3 skulls.
**Dash**: on every skull, it skips forward 8% of the total track length.

**Reality Shield**: On spawn and every time a skull is reached, Phayze has a Reality Shield, of which it's HP of **1/4 of the total health of the raw blimp**. This means the **effective health** of the blimp when including the shield is **2x** the base health
The Reality Shield also increases its **movement speed** when it is active, which depends on the tier of the boss.
**Radar Jam**: disables all non-innate camo-seeing buffs as well as restoring its camo property if it has been stripped every **24s**.
**Global Attack Cooldown Multiplier**:
(a multiplier of 1.1x means your towers will take 1.1x longer in between attacks)

"Opening a tear in the fabric of reality": When each skull is reached, Phayze opens a tear in the fabric reality where it was, which allows bloons to spawn further along the track. (This disappears once Phayze is killed)
eliteDesc: Spawns with **Camo**, and has 5 skulls.
**Dash**: on every skull, it skips forward 8% of the total track length.

**Reality Shield**: On spawn and every time a skull is reached, Phayze has a Reality Shield, of which it's HP of **1/4 of the total health of the raw blimp**. This means the **effective health** of the blimp when including the shield is **2.5x** the base health.
The Reality Shield also increases its **movement speed** when it is active, which depends on the tier of the boss.
**Radar Jam**: disables all non-innate camo-seeing buffs as well as restoring its camo property if it has been stripped every **24s**.
**Global Attack Cooldown Multiplier**: also changes based on the tier of the boss.

"Opening a tear in the fabric of reality": When each skull is reached, Phayze opens a tear in the fabric reality where it was, which allows bloons to spawn further along the track. (this disappears once Phayze is killed)

normalDesc: Every 2 seconds, all Damage over Time (DoT) effects (including sticky bomb) are removed from Blastapopoulos
## Heat
Everytime it is hit by a projectile, it will gain/lose heat
- Weak to purple: +3 heat per projectile
- Ice (including mid-path mermaid): **-5** heat per projectile
- Other projectiles: +1 heat per projectile
- Blastapopoulos passively loses ??? heat/sec while on screen
## Upon reaching a Skull
- 3 towers (closest, furthest, most expensive) get hit by a fireball, magma pool surrounding the tower (radius of 30) lasts for 15s
- Initial 4s stun, then: 150%s, 80% range, 50% projectile speed, and unsellable for the remaining time
- Spawns 6 pyroclastic rocks within 50r, 24s duration
- Instantly fills 25% heat
## On Overheat
- Adds 10s to all cooldowns
- Burns all projectiles in range for 0.2s
- Stuns all towers for 5s
- For the next 20s, newly placed towers will also be stunned for 5s
eliteDesc: Every 2 seconds, all Damage over Time (DoT) effects (including sticky bomb) are removed from Blastapopoulos
## Heat
Everytime it is hit by a projectile, it will gain/lose heat
- Weak to purple: +3 heat per projectile
- Ice (including mid-path mermaid): **-5** heat per projectile
- Other projectiles: +1 heat per projectile
- Blastapopoulos passively loses ??? heat/sec while on screen
## Upon reaching a Skull
- 3 towers (closest, furthest, most expensive) get hit by a fireball, magma pool surrounding the tower (radius of 30) lasts for 15s
- Initial 4s stun, then: 150%s, 80% range, 50% projectile speed, and unsellable for the remaining time
- Spawns 8 pyroclastic rocks within 50r, 24s duration
- Instantly fills 25% heat
## On Overheat
- Adds 15s to all cooldowns
- Burns all projectiles in range for 0.2s
- Stuns all towers for 5s
- For the next 20s, newly placed towers will also be stunned for 5s
